## NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent.collapsible property

The collapsible property for the accordion. Determines whether the accordion can collapse or not.


 {<!-- -->boolean<!-- -->} True if the accordion is collapsible, false otherwise.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly collapsible: import("@angular/core").ModelSignal<boolean>;
```
